Module clock_gl
Package model

Class TimeSingleton

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.TimeSingleton
  • public final class TimeSingleton
extends Object
    A singleton designed to create timestamps from various sources.

      TimeStampApp getAtomicTime()

      Returns the instance of the TimeSingleton
